title: Robert Dinero and Marvin Peart and his son Trey
itunes:title: Robert Dinero and Marvin Peart and his son Trey
description:
Today on the show we had actor Robert Dinero along with the producer of the movie "War With Grandpa" Marvin Peart and his son Tre call in to the show and speak on the making of the movie and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to senator of South Carolina Lindsey Graham for his comments towards the black community. Also, we had Dr, Joy Harden Bradford to speak on her 'Therapy For Black Girls' Podcast, finding the right therapist and More.


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
